author: Naushad K. Cherrayil
title: Is Covid-19 a blessing in disguise for consumer electronics sales in UAE?
description: Retailers report increase in March online sales due to shift in work culture, fuelled by PCs, TVs, gaming consoles and small appliances
content:
The remote work and e-learning initiatives to help slow the spread of the coronavirus are giving rise to an unprecedented surge in online consumer electronics sales in March in the UAE, retailers, vendors and analysts said.
